Name: TA 1302 Rate limit edit page UI tests

Tests.Name: Step 1 - Create a rate limit from the list page

Steps.Name: Test: Create a rate limit with default values
Test: User can create a rate limit with text name
Test: User can create a rate limit with long name
Test: User can create a rate limit with special chars name
Test: User can create a rate limit with trimmed name
Test: User can check trimmedname
Test: User can not create a rate limit with empty name

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
'' is too short

Failed validating 'minLength' in schema['properties']['name']:
    {'description': 'Name of entity shown in UI',
     'minLength': 1,
     'title': 'Name',
     'type': 'string'}

On instance['name']:
    ''"

Steps.Name: Test: User can not create a rate limit with the same name

Expected.Text: b'409 Conflict: entry with name testname already exists in document [ratelimits]'

Steps.Name: Test: User can create rate limit with one rate limit
Test: User cannot delete Count by keys when we have only one
Test: User can add more than one Count by keys
Test: Check that count by `header` cannot be empty
Test: Check that count by `cookie` cannot be empty
Test: Check that count by `argument` cannot be empty
Test: User cannot add same key twice
Test: User can create a rate limit`s timeframe with positive number
Test: User cannot create a rate limit`s timeframe with '0' number
Test: User cannot create a rate limit`s timeframe with text value

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
'text' is not of type 'integer'

Failed validating 'type' in schema['properties']['timeframe']:
    {'description': 'The time in which to limit the requests according to '
                    'the threshold',
     'title': 'Time To Limit',
     'type': 'integer'}

On instance['timeframe']:
    'text'"

Steps.Name: Test: User cannot create a rate limit`s timeframe with negative number
Test: User cannot create a rate limit`s timeframe with decimal number

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
1.25 is not of type 'integer'

Failed validating 'type' in schema['properties']['timeframe']:
    {'description': 'The time in which to limit the requests according to '
                    'the threshold',
     'title': 'Time To Limit',
     'type': 'integer'}

On instance['timeframe']:
    1.25"

Steps.Name: Test: User cannot create a rate limit`s timeframe with empty value

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
'' is not of type 'integer'

Failed validating 'type' in schema['properties']['timeframe']:
    {'description': 'The time in which to limit the requests according to '
                    'the threshold',
     'title': 'Time To Limit',
     'type': 'integer'}

On instance['timeframe']:
    ''"

Steps.Name: Test: User can check action`s types
Test: User cannot create a ban with '0' value

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
0 is less than the minimum of 1

Failed validating 'minimum' in schema['properties']['ttl']:
    {'description': 'Duration time for ban action',
     'minimum': 1,
     'title': 'Ban TTL',
     'type': 'integer'}

On instance['ttl']:
    0"

Steps.Name: Test: User cannot create a ban with '1' value

Expected.Text: b'ttl can only be a multiple of 60'

Steps.Name: Test: User can create a ban with '1440' value
Test: User cannot create a ban with '1441' value

Expected.Text: b'ttl can only be a multiple of 60'

Steps.Name: Test: User cannot create a ban with empty value

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
'' is not of type 'integer'

Failed validating 'type' in schema['properties']['ttl']:
    {'description': 'Duration time for ban action',
     'minimum': 1,
     'title': 'Ban TTL',
     'type': 'integer'}

On instance['ttl']:
    ''"

Steps.Name: Test: User cannot create a ban with negative value

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
-1 is less than the minimum of 1

Failed validating 'minimum' in schema['properties']['ttl']:
    {'description': 'Duration time for ban action',
     'minimum': 1,
     'title': 'Ban TTL',
     'type': 'integer'}

On instance['ttl']:
    -1"

Steps.Name: Test: User cannot create a ban with decimal value

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
1.22 is not of type 'integer'

Failed validating 'type' in schema['properties']['ttl']:
    {'description': 'Duration time for ban action',
     'minimum': 1,
     'title': 'Ban TTL',
     'type': 'integer'}

On instance['ttl']:
    1.22"

Steps.Name: Test: User can create a rate limit with one include
Test: User can create a rate limit with one exclude
Test: User can add several tags to include
Test: User can add several tags to exclude
Test: User cannot add same tag to include twice
Test: User cannot add same tag to exclude twice
Test: User cannot add same tag to exclude and include
Test: User cannot add tag less then 3 chars to include
Test: User cannot add tag less then 3 chars to exclude
Test: User can create a rate limit with number of events: '0'
Test: User can create a rate limit with number of events: '15'
Test: User cannot create rate limit with number of events: text

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
'text' is not of type 'integer'

Failed validating 'type' in schema['properties']['threshold']:
    {'description': 'The threshold of requests allowed',
     'title': 'Threshold',
     'type': 'integer'}

On instance['threshold']:
    'text'"

Steps.Name: Test: User cannot create rate limit with number of events: negative number
Test: User cannot create rate limit with number of events: decimal number

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
1.25 is not of type 'integer'

Failed validating 'type' in schema['properties']['threshold']:
    {'description': 'The threshold of requests allowed',
     'title': 'Threshold',
     'type': 'integer'}

On instance['threshold']:
    1.25"

Test: Verify active checkbox OFF

Test: User cannot add a tag with space char
Test: User can add a tag with leading space char
Test: Verify tag with leading space was trimmed
Test: User can add a tag with trailing space char
Test: Verify tag with trailing space was trimmed
Test: User can create a rate limit 'save_rl'
Test: User can check new rate limit

Tests.Name: Step 16 - linked Security policy we can not Delete

Steps.Name: Test: User can create a rate limit 'security_policy_a'

Test: User cannot delete the rate limit with attached security policy
Test: User can create a rate limit 'test_delete'
Test: User can delete the rate limit 'test_delete'
